MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Thomson Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.32am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Reidvale Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.48am on the 30th of November 2020.
